problems.boolean¶

EvenParity Even parity problem class
get_and Build and get an “and” function.
get_default_function_bank make a function bank with default settings.
get_nand Build and get a “nand” function.
get_nor Build and get a “nor” function.
get_or Build and get an “or” function.
get_x get function of i-th elements in x.
